loginaward_text_twos: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>保持全勤，</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %.1f亿 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>金币hold不住哦！</font>
loginaward_text_three: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>坚持就是胜利！明天也要来签到哦~</font>
loginaward_text_threes: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>坚持就是胜利,最高</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %.1f亿 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>，明天一定来哦~</font>
timegold_text_one: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>时间到！快来领钱！</font>
timegold_text_ones: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>时间到！点一下轻松拿</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %d万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>！</font>
timegold_text_two: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>还有</font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>%s</font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>即可领取</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %d万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>金币</font>
timegold_text_five: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>明天还有更多免费金币等着你！</font>
timegold_text_fives: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>明天还有最多</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %d万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>！</font>
relifefund_text_one: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>没钱不要紧，我们来帮您。</font>
relifefund_text_ones: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>送您</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %lld万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>！不要问我的姓名~</font>
relifefund_text_two: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>开开心心游戏，踏踏实实领钱。</font>
relifefund_text_twos: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>开心游戏，没钱也会送你</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %lld万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>，踏实！</font>
relifefund_text_three: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>今天只能帮您到这了，明天请再来拿钱！</font>
relifefund_text_threes: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>今天就到这了，明天还会送你</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %lld万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>哦！</font>
everyday_quest_text_one: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>一分耕耘一分收获。</font>
everyday_quest_text_ones: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>收获在即，快来领取</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %d万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>吧！</font>
everyday_quest_text_two: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>挑战还在继续，努力就能成功。</font>
everyday_quest_text_twos: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>继续挑战吧，奖金还有</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %d万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>呢！</font>
everyday_quest_text_three: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>明天还要来奋斗哦~</font>
everyday_quest_text_threes: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>任务达人，明天再来搞定</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %d万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>吧！</font>
achievement_text_one: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>您需要一个肯定，来领奖吧！</font>
achievement_text_ones: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>成功人士，来领取你的</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %d万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>吧！</font>
achievement_text_two: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>伟大的事业等着您来奋斗！奖励累计</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> 3000万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>！</font>
BindingMobilePhone_text_one: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>绑定后奖励</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> 100万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>，就这么简单。</font>
updatedversion_text_one: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>用最新的版本，享最好的体验。</font>
updatedversion_text_ones: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>更新版本，享更多体验，还拿</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %d万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>！</font>
updatedversion_text_two: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>走在最前沿的你，请接收我们的一份心意。</font>
updatedversion_text_twos: <?xml version="1.0"?><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>更新大成功，快拿</font><font color='#f517f2' size='35.0'> %d万 </font><font color='#622C00' size='27.0'>！</font>
